name: Bullet Time (itch) (Vendolak)
description:
Introducing Bullet Time, an action-packed multiplayer game that comes in with a bang and leaves all four players with a screw loose!

Well, well, well, if it isn't the fall of a dystopian society at the weaponized hands of killer murderbots? Uncontrollable technology wrecking havoc in corrupt societies is nearly inevitable, so why not have some fun with it? In Bullet Time, we do just that; trapping up to four high-tech automatons to gather scattered power-ups, weaponry, and terrain to blast up some baddies, i.e. each other. So now you can destroy the world AND your buddies- now with controller support!

-

Team DANKT Games' Project 3 for MSU's MI 445

Development Period: 6 Weeks, Prompt: The Matrix

Controller Recommended

-

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

  • WASD: Move
  • Space: Jump
  • F: Shoot/Punch
  • LShift: Lift crates 
  • B: Throw Crates
  • E: Interact
